title: PHV Driver’s Licence - Safety and Compliance

questions.question: What must a PHV driver check before starting their vehicle?
questions.answer: Fuel level, brakes, and lights

questions.question: What is the legal blood alcohol limit for PHV drivers?
questions.answer: 0.0% BAC while driving

questions.question: Which of the following must be displayed in a PHV vehicle?
options: A copy of the PHV insurance policy
questions.answer: The driver’s licence disc

questions.question: What should a PHV driver do if a passenger becomes aggressive?
options: Politely ask them to calm down and, if necessary, report it
Drop them off immediately, even if unsafe
questions.answer: Politely ask them to calm down and, if necessary, report it

questions.question: When is a PHV driver required to report a medical condition to TfL?
options: If the condition affects their ability to drive
questions.answer: If the condition affects their ability to drive

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT required when picking up a passenger?
questions.answer: Requesting the passenger’s home address

questions.question: What should a PHV driver do if they suspect human trafficking?
options: Call the police or report it to authorities
questions.answer: Call the police or report it to authorities

questions.question: Which of these is a legal requirement for PHV drivers?
options: Keeping the vehicle clean and roadworthy
questions.answer: Keeping the vehicle clean and roadworthy

questions.question: Which type of insurance must PHV drivers have?
questions.answer: Hire or reward insurance

questions.question: Which of the following is considered discriminatory under the Equality Act 2010?
options: Refusing a passenger based on their disability
Helping a passenger with a guide dog
Providing service to all passengers equally
questions.answer: Refusing a passenger based on their disability

questions.question: When must a PHV driver check their vehicle for lost property?
options: Only at the end of their shift
questions.answer: After every journey

questions.question: What must a PHV driver do if they receive a police request while on duty?
options: Ignore it if they have a passenger
questions.answer: Comply with the request immediately

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of poor customer service?
options: Refusing to assist a passenger with luggage
questions.answer: Refusing to assist a passenger with luggage

questions.question: What is a PHV driver’s responsibility regarding seat belts?
options: Ensuring all passengers wear seat belts
Only wearing a seat belt themselves
Letting passengers decide whether to wear a seat belt
Providing seat belts only to front-seat passengers
questions.answer: Ensuring all passengers wear seat belts

questions.question: What should a PHV driver do if their vehicle breaks down mid-journey?
options: Ask the passenger to leave immediately
Ensure passenger safety and arrange an alternative vehicle
Ignore the issue and call for help later
questions.answer: Ensure passenger safety and arrange an alternative vehicle

questions.question: Which of the following is required when accepting a booking?
options: Ensuring the passenger has the correct change
Confirming the booking through an operator
Asking the passenger for personal details
questions.answer: Confirming the booking through an operator

questions.question: What should a PHV driver do if a passenger forgets an item in their vehicle?
options: Keep it until the passenger calls
Return it to the operator or local police
questions.answer: Return it to the operator or local police

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT allowed when operating a PHV?
questions.answer: Taking direct street hires

questions.question: What should a PHV driver do if they feel tired while driving?
questions.answer: Take a break and rest

questions.question: What must a PHV driver do if their licence is suspended?
options: Continue working until notified by TfL
questions.answer: Stop working immediately
